key_risks: Class action lawsuits alleging misleading statements to investors
Regulatory scrutiny and potential claims against officers and directors
Franchisee concerns about high fees and operational difficulties
Labor shortages in the automotive repair industry
Vulnerability to economic downturns affecting consumer spending
Leadership transition risks with the resignation of the Chief Accounting Officer
controversies: Multiple class action lawsuits regarding business integration and performance
Investigation into potential claims against company officers and directors
environmental_issues: Introduction of eco-friendly practices such as water recycling and energy-efficient equipment
social_issues: Franchisee relations strained by high fees and operational challenges
Labor shortages impacting service quality and customer satisfaction
governance_issues: Resignation of Chief Accounting Officer Michael Beland, effective January 2025

(NASDAQ: DRVN) between October 27, 2021 and August 1, 2023, both dates inclusive (the "Class Period"). A class action lawsuit has already been filed.
